summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TwinMCP server implementation following Context7 CCTP. All backend API endpoints are functioning correctly with 100% success rate. Frontend landing page displays properly with all required sections including Free vs Pro comparison and Professional plan in pricing section.
passed_tests: GET /api/mcp returns server info and tools list with correct JSON structure
MCP server info includes resolve-library-id and query-docs tools
All required endpoints (mcp, mcpOauth, libraries) are properly configured
GET /api/libraries returns library catalog with pagination (10 libraries found)
Library catalog includes proper pagination fields (total, page, limit, totalPages)
Library entries contain all required fields (id, name, vendor, ecosystem, description, versions)
GET /api/libraries?search=react filters correctly and returns React library
Search functionality works with proper pagination
GET /api/mcp/oauth returns OAuth discovery info with correct structure
OAuth configuration includes clientId, authorizationEndpoint, tokenEndpoint, scopes
OAuth endpoint supports claude-code and cursor clients
MCP JSON-RPC 2.0 protocol format is correctly implemented
Error handling returns proper JSON-RPC error format for unauthorized requests
Landing page loads correctly with TwinMCP branding
Comparison section Free vs Pro is visible and functional
Pricing section shows all three plans: Free, Professional, Enterprise
Professional plan is properly highlighted as 'Le plus populaire' with pricing 14.99€/mois
Free plan shows 0€/mois with basic features (3 serveurs MCP, 200 requêtes/jour)
Professional plan includes advanced features (Serveurs MCP illimités, 10,000 requêtes/jour, Support prioritaire 24/7)
Enterprise plan shows custom pricing with full Pro features plus unlimited requests
Pricing toggle between Mensuel/Annuel is functional
Multiple CTA buttons are present and functional (Essai Gratuit 14 Jours, Démarrer gratuitement)
Page content is properly localized in French
All key pricing terms are present (Professional, Pro, Free, Gratuit, Enterprise, Plan, Tarif)
